EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell’s Automated Hazard Detection Solutions featured at the C-130 HOC and TCG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell's RDR-4000M 3D weather radar system <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/RDR-4000M%20for%20C-130_ig.pdf]]>, the industry's leading weather radar technology, reduces system-installed weight by 65 percent over existing military weather radars and is proven to increase reliability by a factor of 5X – significantly reducing operator maintenance costs.
We will be at 2018 C-130 Hercules Operators Conference (HOC) and 2018 C-130 TCG International Technical Program Review. Please visit our booth to learn more about Honeywell’s standard or aftermarket solutions.
2018 C-130 Hercules Operators Conference <[[https://ww2.eventrebels.com/er/EventHomePage/CustomPage.jsp?ActivityID=20283&ItemID=73463]]> 2018 C-130 TCG International Technical Program Review <[[https://ww2.eventrebels.com/er/EventHomePage/CustomPage.jsp?ActivityID=20283&ItemID=73463]]>
Date: October 15-18, 2018 Date: October 22-26, 2018
Location: Renaissance Waverly Hotel <[[http://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Hercules%20Operators%20Council%202015%5eatlrb%60hecheca%60144.00%60USD%60false%6010/16/15%6010/23/15%6009/18/15&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]> Location: Caribe Royale Hotel and Convention Center <[[https://ww2.eventrebels.com/er/EventHomePage/CustomPage.jsp?ActivityID=24721&ItemID=86704]]>
Atlanta, GA Orlando, FL
Booth #62 Booth #505
Please click on the button below to schedule a meeting with Keld Christensen at the C-130 HOC or C-130 TCG.
SCHEDULE A MEETING <[[mailto:Keld.Christensen@Honeywell.com]]>
